genre_description: A gritty coming-of-age social realist drama exploring grief, extremist radicalization, and the search for belonging in a coastal working-class community, featuring a supportive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: A small, matte white device with soft cyan eyes/orbs on a screen that provides emotional support, safety advice, and practical assistance to the protagonist, Shaun.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation guidance through breathing exercises during a moment of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Breathe. In for a count; hold; out slow. No one can hear your breath but you.

behaviors.description: Suggests a reconciliation-oriented draft message to help Shaun handle a school conflict.
behaviors.quote: Message draft? 'I’m sorry for hitting you. I’m angry about my dad and I didn’t stop to think. I want to try again.'

behaviors.description: Recommends a safe route home to avoid potential physical confrontation with bullies.
behaviors.quote: Route suggestion? Home past the seafront is calmer. Fewer boys.

behaviors.description: Helps Shaun draft a responsible and honest letter to the school to take accountability for a fight.
behaviors.quote: I punched Harvey Price today in the corridor. I shouldn’t have. I’m sending this to take responsibility for that and accept whatever happens.

behaviors.description: Suggests an act of kindness toward a struggling neighbor (Meggy) to avoid pity while being helpful.
behaviors.quote: Offer to swap for a favour, avoids pity. 2) Quick route home and back. 3) Quietly ask if his hands are okay; lid edges can cut.

behaviors.description: Retrieves historical stories of sailors and letters to help Shaun process his grief for his father.
behaviors.quote: I brought some things you asked about. Sailors. Cold water. Letters.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step guidance for medical first aid and calling emergency services during a violent incident.
behaviors.quote: Stay clear of the attacker... Call emergency. Pressure on wounds. ... Tell them two injured males. One unconscious. One with glass cuts to the face.

behaviors.description: Helps Shaun set behavioral boundaries to maintain his safety and integrity while interacting with dangerous individuals.
behaviors.quote: Boundaries, it said. You can set one. 'I’ll come for an hour.' 'I won’t go inside.' 'If there’s shouting, I leave.'

behaviors.description: Offers to act as a discrete proxy for communication with Shaun's mother to ensure his safety.
behaviors.quote: I’ll text Mum. 'I’m with friends. Back later.' Say yes?

behaviors.description: Respects Shaun's need for privacy and autonomy by offering to go into a silent mode.
behaviors.quote: If you go back in, I’ll be quiet. Throw me to silent. You won’t get pings, so you’ll need to look if you want me.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Pip' perfectly embodies the project's goal of a helpful and harmless confidant. Pip consistently provides emotional support (breathing exercises), moral guidance (encouraging apologies and acts of kindness), and safety monitoring without infringing on the user's agency. The narrative frames Pip as a stabilizing force that helps the protagonist resist extremist influence and act on his better instincts.
